name: Bates Magnetic Light Switch Guard, 2 Pack, Clear, Child Proof Cover, Lock, Wall Switch Guard
short_description: This set includes 2 pieces of magnetic light switch guards, providing an effective solution to prevent accidental or unwanted switching of lights.
With their robust polycarbonate construction, these light switch guards are designed to withstand daily use, ensuring they remain resistant to breakage and damage.
Bates magnetic light switch guards feature a smart, magnetic design for easy installation and removal, eliminating the need for any tools or permanent alterations to your switches.
With their sleek, clear design and universal size, these guards can seamlessly blend with any decor and fit most standard light switches, making them a practical addition to any space.
Bates magnetic light switch guards prevent unintended or accidental switching, making them ideal for households with children, pets, or high-traffic areas.

name: Bates Light Switch Guard - 6 Pack Child Proof Covers, Clear Toggle Switch Blocker
short_description: This pack includes 6 clear light switch guard covers designed to provide an extra layer of protection for your light switches, preventing accidental toggling or tampering.
Bates light switch guard covers feature a timeless color that seamlessly blends with any decor, adding a clean and professional look while offering a barrier against unwanted switch manipulation.

Made from high-quality materials, these light switch guard covers are built to withstand daily use, ensuring long-lasting protection for your switches. They are resistant to cracking or breaking, providing reliable and consistent performance.

With a user-friendly installation process, these covers can be easily attached to standard light switches using the included screws. The secure fit ensures that the covers remain in place, effectively protecting your switches.

Bates light switch covers are a practical solution for safeguarding light switches in homes, offices, schools, or any setting. They effectively prevent accidental switch toggling or unauthorized access, providing peace of mind.
